Hyper - text reference
the scenario that the hypothetical 'user' wants to see on the page - you have to build it out. Can be detailed or vague.
text that displays when the browser can't load the element or for impared users. This text is also a great way to get found in search results.
The commonly used sections that compose your HTML file. Containers help with readability and organization
the extra information inside an HTML element that povides additional data.

Element / class / id : the selector determining which bits of the HTML page will be styled. Element seletcs all of that particular type of element, Class (.) selects all elements with the that class attribute, and ID (#) seletcs only the particular element with that ID listed.
Not a Number
Software Design Engineer in Test
Software Design Engineer
A list of computer instructions that tell a computer what to do.
add commit push
camelCasingthe standard style of capitalization in JavaScript, where theLaterWordsAreInCaps. because it looks like camelHumps.
insert
the input, eg the 9 in multiply(9)
variables in a function name that recieve an input
a function that is bound to an identifier or name
% , finds the remainder
the symbols used to assign values, compare values, perform arithmetic operations, etc.
the numerical value assigned to strings is based off of the first letter.This is the mathematical term for alphabetical order.
true and false values
the degree to which an object is accessible by other functions.Eg.an object within a function is local to that function, where as an object outside of all functions has global scope.
while loops and for loops let you perform an action multiple times, or only in certain cases.
i, the count commonly used in for loops
application programing interface
data base management system
“client - side” development, where the focus is on what users see
software that is available for public use, change, and improvement
specifies the object or variable within that particular scope.changes when called in a different location.
a function that creates a new object
accessable from any location
accessable only within the object
'listens' for a specific event to happen on the web page, which calls the action assigned
functions within functions.some examples are the functions you can add within.filter.map and.reduce
the number of expected arguments in a function. Eg. function(a, b, c) has an arity of .
regular expression
developer
project manager
a syntax extension for JavaScript to be used with React. JSX is not 'real' JavaScript, so it needs to go through a compiler so that the browser will know what to do with it.
common placeholder names when the name is temporary or unimportant. Used to help stress the concept or idea rather than the function itself.
a virtual copy of the actual DOM which allows React to update only changed objects. it does this by diffing.
a change updates the entire virtual DOM, which then is compared to a pre-snapshot. Only changed objects get updated in the real DOM.
expressions that are only executed under certain conditions
we can write methods, and js also includes available methods. Essentially a built-in function / a function built in to an object
a function that calls itself as part of the function. Works using built-in stacks.
a file that contains a set of data. Arranged in an array, commonly with multiple key values.
loeds data before use to help speed up page loading time.
content delivery network
small, reusable pieces of code that return a React element to be rendered to the page.
inputs to a component or function. Used to pass data down from a parent to a child.
